Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
  • public class Item
extends Object
    Class Item - an item in The Spooky Mansion game. This class is part of The Spooky Mansion application. The Spooky Mansion is a very simple, text based adventure game. Each item has a (String) description, a (integer) weight, a (String) name, and a boolean for whether the item can be picked up.
    Version:
    2021.10.22
    Author:
    Emma Grey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Item​(String itemName, String itemDescription, int itemWeight, boolean pickedUp)
      Create an item object, after supplying it with a name, description, weight (in spoops), and whether it can picked up.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getDescription()
      Return the description of the current item.
      String getItemDetails()
      Return a string with all the details of the item.
      String getName()
      Return the name of the current item.
      int getWeight()
      Return the weight of the current item.
      boolean isTakeable()
      Return whether player can take the item.

        itemName - name of the item
        itemDescription - what the item is
        itemWeight - how much the item weighs
